mapper.insert: INSERT INTO onestoit_employee_base ( employee_id, username, type, name, gender, birthday, password, tel, email, skill ) VALUES ( #{employeeId}, #{username}, #{type}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{password}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{skill} );

select * from onestoit_employee_base where employee_id = #{username} and password = #{password};
